snippet: Motorola Mobility and Nokia unveiled their latest smartphones just ahead of Apple’s introduction of its next iPhone.
abstract: Motorola Mobility and Nokia unveil their latest smartphones just ahead of Apple’s introduction of its next iPhone; much depends on the success of the phones, as their shares of the phone market continue to slide while sales of Apple and Samsung devices soar.

headline.main: Motorola and Nokia Try to Gain an Edge in the Smartphone Market
headline.print_headline: Motorola and Nokia Try to Gain an Edge in the Smartphone Market

snippet: This new variation on electronic communication is quietly winning over millions of mobile device users.

headline.main: FedEx Down, Facebook Up in Mixed Day for Traders

snippet: The thermometer may not show it, but the calendar does: Fall foliage season is almost upon us. Here are tips for scoring leaf-peeping deals in five Northeast locations.

headline.main: How to See Fall’s Leaves for Less
headline.print_headline: Where Fall Deals Grow on Trees

snippet: Apple denied claims that it had worked with the Federal Bureau of Investigation to share unique identification numbers from Apple devices and its customers.
abstract: Apple denied claims that it had worked with the Federal Bureau of Investigation to share unique identification numbers from Apple devices and its customers.

headline.main: Apple Denies Giving F.B.I. Device Information

snippet: Starting first with individual sports teams and then expanding to leagues, the environmental movement has won converts.
abstract: Starting first with individual sports teams and then expanding to leagues, the environmental movement has won converts.

headline.main: As Arenas Go Green, Will Fans Follow?

snippet: After being quiet for nearly a year, Motorola Mobility, recently acquired by Google, is returning to the mobile market with three new smartphones for Verizon customers.
abstract: After being quiet for nearly a year, Motorola Mobility, recently acquired by Google, is returning to the mobile market with three new smartphones for Verizon customers.

headline.main: Motorola Introduces First Phones of Its New Google Era

snippet: Restaurant prices that vary by reservation time, hackers who claim to have 12 million Apple device records, ways to save rubles in St. Petersburg and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Restaurant prices that vary by reservation time, hackers who claim to have 12 million Apple device records, ways to save rubles in St. Petersburg and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

snippet: Accel Partners announced a big investment in Tenable Network Security, a maker of security software, as venture capital firms plow more and more money into such start-ups.
abstract: Accel Partners announced a big investment in Tenable Network Security, a maker of security software, as venture capital firms plow more and more money into such start-ups.

snippet: Stocks were narrowly mixed in uncommitted trade on the first day of business day after a holiday, and seemed likely to stay muddled until Thursday’s meeting of the European Central Bank.
abstract: Stocks are narrowly mixed on the first business day after the Labor Day holiday, and seem likely to stay muddled until midweek meeting of the European Central Bank.

headline.main: Mired Shares Await Word on Europe
headline.print_headline: Mired Shares Await Word On Europe
